welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Riviera Beach! Known for its stunning beaches and charming coastal vibe, this city has so much to offer. We invite you to explore and soak up all the charm and beauty this destination has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palm Beach County Park Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Palm Beach County Park Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Southwest Airlines Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal exclusively serves Southwest Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the Wi-Fi network for free by selecting the network and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.
